ayas.arabic: قٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْمَجِيدِ
ayas.translation: Qaf. I swear by the glorious Quran (that Muhammad is the Apostle of Allah)
ayas.transliteration: qāf ۚ wal qur-ānil majīd

ayas.arabic: بَلْ عَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَقَالَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا شَىْءٌ عَجِيبٌ
ayas.translation: Nay! they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, so the unbelievers say: This is a wonderful thing:
ayas.transliteration: bal `ajibū an jā-ahum mundhirun minhum faqālal-kāfirūna hādhā shay-un `ajīb

ayas.arabic: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا ۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجْعٌۢ بَعِيدٌ
ayas.translation: What! when we are dead and have become dust? That is afar (from probable) return.
ayas.transliteration: a-idhā mitnā wakunnā turābā ۖ dhālika raj`un ba`īd

ayas.arabic: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَـٰبٌ حَفِيظٌۢ
ayas.translation: We know indeed what the earth diminishes of them, and with Us is a writing that preserves.
ayas.transliteration: qad `alimnā mā tanquṣul-arḍu minhum ۖ wa`indanā kitābun ḥafīẓ

ayas.arabic: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِىٓ أَمْرٍ مَّرِيجٍ
ayas.translation: Nay, they rejected the truth when it came to them, so they are (now) in a state of confusion.
ayas.transliteration: bal kadhhabū bil ḥaqqi lammā jā-ahum fahum fī amrin marīj

ayas.arabic: أَفَلَمْ يَنظُرُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٍ
ayas.translation: Do they not then look up to heaven above them how We have made it and adorned it and it has no gaps?
ayas.transliteration: afalam yanẓurū ilas samā-i fawqahum kayfa banaynāhā wazayyannāhā wa mā lahā min furūj

ayas.arabic: وَٱلْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَـٰهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍۭ بَهِيجٍ
ayas.translation: And the earth, We have made it plain and cast in it mountains and We have made to grow therein of all beautiful kinds,
ayas.transliteration: wal-arḍa madadnāhā wa-alqaynā fīhā rawāsiya wa-anbatnā fīhā min kulli zawjin bahīj

ayas.arabic: تَبْصِرَةً وَذِكْرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُّنِيبٍ
ayas.translation: To give sight and as a reminder to every servant who turns frequently (to Allah).
ayas.transliteration: tabṣiratan wadhikrā likulli `abdin munīb

ayas.arabic: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً مُّبَـٰرَكًا فَأَنۢبَتْنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٍ وَحَبَّ ٱلْحَصِيدِ
ayas.translation: And We send down from the cloud water abounding in good, then We cause to grow thereby gardens and the grain that is reaped,
ayas.transliteration: wanazzalnā minas samā-i mā-an mubārakan fa-anbatnā bihi jannātin waḥabbal ḥaṣīd

ayas.arabic: وَٱلنَّخْلَ بَاسِقَـٰتٍ لَّهَا طَلْعٌ نَّضِيدٌ
ayas.translation: And the tall palm-trees having spadices closely set one above another,
ayas.transliteration: wan nakhla bāsiqātin lahā ṭal`un naḍīd

ayas.arabic: رِّزْقًا لِّلْعِبَادِ ۖ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِۦ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْخُرُوجُ
ayas.translation: A sustenance for the servants, and We give life thereby to a dead land; thus is the rising.
ayas.transliteration: rizqal lil`ibād ۖ wa-aḥyaynā bihi baldatan maytā ۚ kadhālikal khurūj

ayas.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
ayas.translation: (Others) before them rejected (prophets): the people of Nuh and the dwellers of Ar-Rass and Samood,
ayas.transliteration: kadhhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin wa-aṣ-ḥābur rassi wathamūd

ayas.arabic: وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ وَإِخْوَٰنُ لُوطٍ
ayas.translation: And Ad and Firon and Lut's brethren,
ayas.transliteration: wa`ādun wafir`awnu wa ikhwānu lūṭ

ayas.arabic: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْأَيْكَةِ وَقَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ ۚ كُلٌّ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
ayas.translation: And the dwellers of the grove and the people of Tuba; all rejected the apostles, so My threat came to pass.
ayas.transliteration: wa-aṣ-ḥābul-aykati waqawmu tubba` ۚ kullun kadhhabar rusula faḥaqqa wa`īd

ayas.arabic: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلْخَلْقِ ٱلْأَوَّلِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى لَبْسٍ مِّنْ خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
ayas.translation: Were We then fatigued with the first creation? Yet are they in doubt with regard to a new creation.
ayas.transliteration: afa`ayynā bil khalqil-awwal ۚ bal hum fī labsin min khalqin jadīd

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِۦ نَفْسُهُۥ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ ٱلْوَرِيدِ
ayas.translation: And certainly We created man, and We know what his mind suggests to him, and We are nearer to him than his life-vein.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnal-insāna wana`lamu mā tuwaswisu bihi nafsuh ۖ wanaḥnu aqrabu ilayhi min ḥablil warīd

ayas.arabic: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌ
ayas.translation: When the two receivers receive, sitting on the right and on the left.
ayas.transliteration: idh yatalaqqal mutalaqqiyāni `anil yamīni wa`anish shimāli qa`īd

ayas.arabic: مَّا يَلْفِظُ مِن قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌ
ayas.translation: He utters not a word but there is by him a watcher at hand.
ayas.transliteration: mā yalfiẓu min qawlin illā ladayhi raqībun `atīd

ayas.arabic: وَجَآءَتْ سَكْرَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ
ayas.translation: And the stupor of death will come in truth; that is what you were trying to escape.
ayas.transliteration: wajā-at sakratul mawti bil ḥaqq ۖ dhālika mā kunta minhu taḥīd

ayas.arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْوَعِيدِ
ayas.translation: And the trumpet shall be blown; that is the day of the threatening.
ayas.transliteration: wanufikha fiṣ ṣūr ۚ dhālika yawmul wa`īd

ayas.arabic: وَجَآءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ
ayas.translation: And every soul shall come, with it a driver and a witness.
ayas.transliteration: wajā-at kullu nafsin ma`ahā sā-iqun washahīd

ayas.arabic: لَّقَدْ كُنتَ فِى غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنكَ غِطَآءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌ
ayas.translation: Certainly you were heedless of it, but now We have removed from you your veil, so your sight today is sharp.
ayas.transliteration: laqad kunta fī ghaflatim min hādhā fakashafnā `anka ghiṭā-aka fabaṣarukal yawma ḥadīd

ayas.arabic: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَـٰذَا مَا لَدَىَّ عَتِيدٌ
ayas.translation: And his companions shall say: This is what is ready with me.
ayas.transliteration: waqāla qarīnuhu hādhā mā ladayya `atīd

ayas.arabic: أَلْقِيَا فِى جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍ
ayas.translation: Do cast into hell every ungrateful, rebellious one,
ayas.transliteration: alqiyā fī jahannama kulla kaffārin `anīd

ayas.arabic: مَّنَّاعٍ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ مُّرِيبٍ
ayas.translation: Forbidder of good, exceeder of limits, doubter,
ayas.transliteration: mannā`in lilkhayri mu`tadin murīb

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ
ayas.translation: Who sets up another god with Allah, so do cast him into severe chastisement.
ayas.transliteration: alladhī ja`ala ma`allāhi ilāhan ākhara fa-alqiyāhu fil `adhābish shadīd

ayas.arabic: قَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ رَبَّنَا مَآ أَطْغَيْتُهُۥ وَلَـٰكِن كَانَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۭ بَعِيدٍ
ayas.translation: His companion will say: Our Lord! I did not lead him into inordinacy but he himself was in a great error.
ayas.transliteration: qāla qarīnuhu rabbanā mā aṭghaytuhu walākin kāna fī ḍalālin ba`īd

ayas.arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا۟ لَدَىَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُم بِٱلْوَعِيدِ
ayas.translation: He will say: Do not quarrel in My presence, and indeed I gave you the threatening beforehand:
ayas.transliteration: qāla lā takhtaṣimū ladayya waqad qaddamtu ilaykum bil wa`īd

ayas.arabic: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلْقَوْلُ لَدَىَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّـٰمٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
ayas.translation: My word shall not be changed, nor am I in the least unjust to the servants.
ayas.transliteration: mā yubaddalul qawlu ladayya wa mā ana biẓallāmin lil`abīd

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِن مَّزِيدٍ
ayas.translation: On the day that We will say to hell: Are you filled up? And it will say: Are there any more?
ayas.transliteration: yawma naqūlu lijahannama halim-tala-ti wataqūlu hal min mazīd

ayas.arabic: وَأُزْلِفَتِ ٱلْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ
ayas.translation: And the garden shall be brought near to those who guard (against evil), not far off:
ayas.transliteration: wa-uzlifatil jannatu lil-muttaqīna ghayra ba`īd

ayas.arabic: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍ
ayas.translation: This is what you were promised, (it is) for every one who turns frequently (to Allah), keeps (His limits);
ayas.transliteration: hādhā mā tū`adūna likulli awwābin ḥafīẓ

ayas.arabic: مَّنْ خَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلْبٍ مُّنِيبٍ
ayas.translation: Who fears the Beneficent Allah in secret and comes with a penitent heart:
ayas.transliteration: man khashiyar raḥmāna bil ghaybi wajā-a biqalbin munīb

ayas.arabic: ٱدْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَـٰمٍ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُلُودِ
ayas.translation: Enter it in peace, that is the day of abiding.
ayas.transliteration: ud-khulūhā bisalām ۖ dhālika yawmul khulūd

ayas.arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌ
ayas.translation: They have therein what they wish and with Us is more yet.
ayas.transliteration: lahum mā yashā-ūna fīhā waladaynā mazīd

ayas.arabic: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُم بَطْشًا فَنَقَّبُوا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ هَلْ مِن مَّحِيصٍ
ayas.translation: And how many a generation did We destroy before them who were mightier in prowess than they, so they went about and about in the lands. Is there a place of refuge?
ayas.transliteration: wakam ahlaknā qablahum min qarnin hum ashaddu minhum baṭshan fanaqqabū fil bilādi hal min maḥīṣ

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى ٱلسَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ
ayas.translation: Most surely there is a reminder in this for him who has a heart or he gives ear and is a witness.
ayas.transliteration: inna fī dhālika ladhikrā liman kāna lahu qalbun aw alqas sam`a wahuwa shahīd

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٍ
ayas.translation: And certainly We created the heavens and the earth and what is between them in six periods and there touched Us not any fatigue.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnas samāwāti wal-arḍa wa mā baynahumā fī sittati ayyāmin wa mā massanā min lughūb

ayas.arabic: فَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ ٱلْغُرُوبِ
ayas.translation: Therefore be patient of what they say, and sing the praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before the setting.
ayas.transliteration: faṣbir `alā mā yaqūlūna wasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika qabla ṭulū`ish shamsi waqablal-ghurūb

ayas.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَأَدْبَـٰرَ ٱلسُّجُودِ
ayas.translation: And glorify Him in the night and after the prayers.
ayas.transliteration: wa minal layli fasabbiḥ-hu wa-adbāras sujūd

ayas.arabic: وَٱسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ ٱلْمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
ayas.translation: And listen on the day when the crier shall cry from a near place
ayas.transliteration: wastami` yawma yunādil munādi min makānin qarīb

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيْحَةَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُرُوجِ
ayas.translation: The day when they shall hear the cry in truth; that is the day of coming forth.
ayas.transliteration: yawma yasma`ūnaṣ ṣayḥata bil ḥaqq ۚ dhālika yawmul khurūj

ayas.arabic: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا ٱلْمَصِيرُ
ayas.translation: Surely We give life and cause to die, and to Us is the eventual coming;
ayas.transliteration: innā naḥnu nuḥyī wanumītu wa ilaynal maṣīr

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌ
ayas.translation: The day on which the earth shall cleave asunder under them, they will make haste; that is a gathering together easy to Us.
ayas.transliteration: yawma tashaqqaqul-arḍu `anhum sirā`ā ۚ dhālika ḥashrun `alaynā yasīr

ayas.arabic: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِجَبَّارٍ ۖ فَذَكِّرْ بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
ayas.translation: We know best what they say, and you are not one to compel them; therefore remind him by means of the Quran who fears My threat.
ayas.transliteration: naḥnu a`lamu bimā yaqūlūn ۖ wa mā anta `alayhim bijabbār ۖ fadhakkir bil qur-āni man yakhāfu wa`īd
